infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your photo library to let you select and upload images for ranking items.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera to let you take photos for ranking items.

plugins.photosPermission: This app needs access to your photos to let you select and upload images for ranking items.
plugins.cameraPermission: This app needs access to your camera to let you take photos for ranking items.
